TopicTitle: Astronomers Visual Enhancement Pack Sunflare bug

Articles.Content:
I have recently downloaded AVE for KSP to jazz up the graphics a bit, and everything was working fine. I have all the required mods such as EVE, scatterer, and module manager in my GameData folder, but I have encountered one problem; The sun isn't shining as i'd like it too, and it's bothering me.

https://imgur.com/gallery/hEw1Tnd

here's an image of what I see, I had Galileo's Scatterers installed, but it gave me an error message saying that it wasn't supported in this game version. I have no other visual mods other than the ones I have listed. Is there a way I can fix this?

What version of KSP is this, and what mods do you have installed? This should help you track that information down:

Best guess- something isn't installed properly or you don't have a dependency that you need to get the sunflare to work. Try another visual pack e.g. Spectra, which has its own sunflare, and see if that works- if it does then it's Astronomer's Visual Pack that's to blame, but if not then I'd suggest checking your mod versions, especially scatterer, are compatible with your version of KSP.

1 hour ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

What version of KSP is this, and what mods do you have installed? This should help you track that information down:

Best guess- something isn't installed properly or you don't have a dependency that you need to get the sunflare to work. Try another visual pack e.g. Spectra, which has its own sunflare, and see if that works- if it does then it's Astronomer's Visual Pack that's to blame, but if not then I'd suggest checking your mod versions, especially scatterer, are compatible with your version of KSP.

Thank you for the help, I ended up just uninstalling AVP due to an abundance of other problems along with this. I am now using Spectra and my game is doing perfectly fine. Thank you again!

11 hours ago, jopun said:

Thank you for the help, I ended up just uninstalling AVP due to an abundance of other problems along with this. I am now using Spectra and my game is doing perfectly fine. Thank you again!

No problem. I actually prefer Spectra to AVP as I think it looks better and performs a bit better too.
